content: the crochet ghost is made all in one no sew 1 with one strand of flutterby the pumpkin is crocheted using 2 strands of double knit held together use a hook that you can work easily with i used a 4 00 mm hook however i crochet extremely loosely you can up a size if needed to a 4 50mm 1 https //www crochet-patterns-free com/2023/09/easy-free-small-crochet-ghost-pumpkin html
